name: Chicken Cult
description:
A 3D adventure game where you play as a group of chickens that will consume anything and everything in their path.

Interactions are simple as jumping, walking, and flying. 

Player Controls:

Arrow Keys for movement of the player

Space repeatedly to fly

Space bar to jump

Credits:

Game made in Unity by Clinton Thai

Art Assets:

Unity Store - to be added

Music:
